title: Iran ready to discuss compromises to reach nuclear deal, minister tells BBC in Tehran
summary_full: Majid Takht-Ravanchi, Iran's deputy foreign minister, tells the BBC's Lyse Doucet that the ball was "in America's court to prove that they want to do a deal".
summary_public: Majid Takht-Ravanchi, Iran's deputy foreign minister, tells the BBC's Lyse Doucet that the ball was "in America's court to prove that they want to do a deal".

IR.label: positive
IR.evidence: Iran ready to discuss compromises to reach nuclear deal
